long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify your AliExpress shopping experience with the AliExpress Auto Feedback extension. This tool automatically submits 5-star feedback for your orders and redirects you after the feedback submission, saving you time and effort. Perfect for regular AliExpress shoppers who want to streamline their feedback process.

Key Features:

Auto Feedback Submission: Automatically fills in 5-star ratings for all aspects of your orders.
Auto Redirect: Redirects you to the feedback management page after submitting feedback.
Toggle Controls: Easily enable or disable the automatic feedback submission and redirection through the extension's settings page.
User-Friendly Interface: Modern, easy-to-use interface for a seamless user experience.
Feedback Management: Ensures your feedback is always positive, helping you maintain a good relationship with sellers.
How to Use:

Install the extension.
Open the extension settings by clicking on the extension icon.
Enable or disable the "Automatically submit the feedback form" and "Automatically redirect after submission" options as per your preference.
Shop on AliExpress as usual. The extension will handle the rest.

Support:
For any issues or suggestions, please contact us via Instagram: SpaseMice.
